about_the_game:
Every choice you make influences the outcome. From who to trust to which leads to follow, your decisions shape the investigation's direction and the final resolution. Choose wisely. The mystery awaits.

Story
Orion Everton, the most successful detective of Metrosomia, tries to solve the suspicious murder of Isabelle Rose, who was shot during a show at the city's theater.

Cases
Find yourself in cases that involve multiple and different adventures. Get to know the characters. Visit the crime scene. Understand who's telling the truth and who's lying. Compare the statements given with the evidence. Combine the pins on the board and identify the culprit. Close the case.

Dialogues
Try to solve how the incident happened by interrogating the characters involved in the incident. Characters can lie. Characters may not even be honest about their own names. Try to separate the characters involved in the event from those who are not. Some choices made in the dialogues determine the course of the game.

Notebook
Every new piece of information you learn is automatically noted. Your biggest helper in solving the case will be the notebook in your pocket. You decide in the notebook whether the information people give is correct or wrong. Every piece of evidence leaves question marks in your head. Finding the right answers to these question marks is in your hands. Wrong answers make you believe that the event happened in a different way.


Crime Scene
Examine the scene of the incident thoroughly. Every detail could be important. Some of them are quite irrelevant and unrelated. Distinguish the relevant and important ones from the others and try to bring the truth to light.

Board
Put together the pins on the board. The decisions you make in the notebook affect your thoughts on the board. The last person or how the event happened that you found on the board may not be the correct result. Solve the mystery by making consistent and logical choices. Close the case by making a decision with the last pin on the board.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Prove that you are a smart detective. Determine the course of the story with interactive dialogues. Bring together the pieces of the case with a detective board based on multiple choices and decision-making. Solve the mystery behind the evidence you find. Interrogate people. Close the case.
